name: Un rêve sans fin
description:
Synopsis :

A young figure skater is in a coma, imprisoned in a dream. Help her to wake up, collect memories and find the exit.

Controls :

Move : Arrows

Turn camera : Mouse

Take object & open doors : Mouse left click

This game has been made during the Panam anim jam (48h).

The team :

David Birgé-Cotte : Developer (https://prtesla.itch.io/)

Rémi Leblanc : Level Designer (https://remi-leblanc.itch.io/)

Aurélien Montéro : Sound Deisgner & Composer (http://www.aurelienmontero.com/)

Roméo Susbielle : 3D artist
